title: Who is the best Professor for capstone mentoring.
content:
Can anybody please tell how these professors are as a capstone guide cause I am thinking of choosing one of them as my capstone guide.
Domain (ml,nlp)

Dr Jyothi R
Chitra G M
Dr Preethi P
Dr priyanka H

comments.body: Don't choose Jyothi r, chita g m and priyanka h. Avoid them at all cost. Even preethi p is not so good, but if you don't have an option it's a good one then
What about ashwini m joshi, Dinesh singh, Surabhi Narayan, Shivagamasundari
What about ashwini m joshi, Dinesh singh, Surabhi Narayan, Shivagamasundari
Surabhi mam is great. Other all are not so good for ml domain.

Ashwini mam was our CN faculty in 4th sem and was very good at teaching and hands-on. But some reddit posts on her says that she is not good at mentoring [but it seems that she is well versed in her domain-ML(I'm telling this based on her depth knowledge and clarity on explanation in CN)] and won't provide good grades. The grades are decided by panel and not by mentors right?

If anyone got her as a capstone mentor or any of your friends got her & shared their experience with you, please share it with me as soon as possible.üôè
Grade depends majorly on your mentor more than panel;
Please tell about her (Ashwini mam) as a mentor
I have heard she is not so good as a mentor.
